name: euorv
params: setvar s0, wff w0, wff w1
body: |- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))

stmt.origin: biimpa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1))))

body.origin:
|- wi(wn(w0), wb(weu(s0, w1), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1))))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, wo(w0, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wi(wn(w0), wb(w1, wo(w0, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w0))

|- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, wn(w0))

|- wi(wa(wn(w0), weu(s0, w1)), weu(s0, wo(w0, w1)))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Introduce a disjunct into a unique existential quantifier. Version of ~ euor requiring disjoint variables, but fewer axioms. (Contributed by NM, 23-Mar-1995.) Reduce dependencies on axioms. (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 14-Jan-2023.)
